C I R C U L A R   NO.   37 /2005 
 
 
Subject:         CATEGORIZATION OF AIRPORTS 
 
 
 Threat perception at all operational airports in the country has been 
reviewed in consultation with intelligence agencies. In suppersession of previous 
Circular No. 8/2003 dated 31-3-2003 on the above subject, a revised 
consolidated list of Normal, Sensitive and Hypersensitive airports is given below 
for information and necessary action: 
 
 
 
(A)      NORMAL AIRPORTS
